channel.title: Some quick help please
channel.description:
I'm trying to figure out how to modify my vote shop. I have these reward tokens which players receive after ::vote and ::claim and i'm not too sure how to make the shop only accept these "reward tokens*. Please reply below with a few suggestions thanks .
Peace boys
